title: Why doesn't Gangplanks passive work on Dragon or Baron?
body:
I noticed this when playing Gangplank but when I solo'd dragon, it wasn't taking any damage from my passive for some reason, same thing happened with Baron.

Darius can apply his passive on Dragon and Baron.

Twitch can as well.

Cass can poison both of them.


Why can't Gangplank?

replies.body:
Good question, I have never noticed it before. That kinda saddens me :(

If i had to guess it would be because it also slows, and baron and drag are coded to be immune to CC, thus some where along the line it completely blocks out his passive because of the slow. Which should be fixed.

Yup, that'll be the problem. Debuffs have different types in spell scripts, and Dragon/Baron are set up to reject all the different crowd control types. In this case the logic for the DoT is included within the slow debuff file, which never gets applied to CC immune targets (that'll include Olaf and champions with Black Shield on them as well, not just Dragon/Baron) and as a result the DoT script never gets run. Normally we split damage and CC into different files to avoid this exact problem, looks like someone missed that with GP at some point though.

TLDR: Bug, we'll fix.

Yo, another bug you could look at is that machete doesn't actually grant health regen in combat with monsters. It grants health regen when attacked by monsters, so people who can cc camps like volibear are effectively gimping themselves out of health regen.
fix pls

> [{quoted}](name=Tisio,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Wdn0gbjF,comment-id=000000020000,timestamp=2015-03-04T06:24:39.129+0000)
>
> Yo, another bug you could look at is that machete doesn't actually grant health regen in combat with monsters. It grants health regen when attacked by monsters, so people who can cc camps like volibear are effectively gimping themselves out of health regen.
> fix pls

Yeah this effectively gives you no benefit when doing crab 

Riot really needs to fix this
or a least change to tool tip lol
PLEASE at least change the tooltip.

Initially we wanted to avoid the health battery scenario of the machete line. That is:
1. Drive-by shot  to regen. Hit the monster to trigger the combat and keep moving.
2. Healing significantly off of rift scuttler, especially early game.

Of those two issues, 1 isn't actually that big of a deal (the regen falls off pretty quickly) and 2 could be solved in other ways. We're looking into machete tweaks atm (nothing committed to yet) so we could wrap a change to "in combat with monsters" in there.

Alright thanks.
At least I know it's like this for a reaosn and not by accident

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Reinboom,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Wdn0gbjF,comment-id=0000000200000002,timestamp=2015-03-04T21:31:26.386+0000)
>
> Initially we wanted to avoid to avoid the health battery scenario of the machete line. That is:
> 1. Drive shot by to regen. Hit the monster to trigger the combat and keep moving.
> 2. Healing significantly off of rift scuttler, especially early game.
> 
> Of those two issues, 1 isn't actually that big of a deal (the regen falls off pretty quickly) and 2 could be solved in other ways. We're looking into machete tweaks atm (nothing committed to yet) so we could wrap a change to "in combat with monsters" in there.

Or make it so scuttler isn't a monster.

Make him a minion /nod.
You also don't get the regen when fighting dragon/baron
Kayle's Q does not apply the shred debuff to Dragon or Baron, probably for the same reason.
Dragon and Baron are Shred immune, so that one's deliberate (if it's not shredding CC immune targets like Olaf during his ult, Malphite when ulting etc that's a bug though).

Makes sense!

 (I blame Heimerdinger for this :P)

Going with the same bug type, can you fix Yi so that he isn't immune to being squirreled by lulu in his ult? The spell has a slow in it, and he is immune to the entire thing. He should still be squirreled, but just be a squirrel that's not slow.
On a slightly related note, does Sona's damage reduction from her Aria of Perseverance (w) Power Chord actually reduce Baron and Dragon's damage by 20%?
Speaking of bugs of passives, any word on when Karthus's passive bug is gonna get fixed? (for y'all the don't know, during his passive, sometimes Karthus's Q goes on a 2 second cooldown.)

Similar issue, Viktor cannot stun Master Yi while ulting, as being slow-immune blocks charges from gathering against him. Since Master Yi's biggest counter is hard CC, I find it quite irritating that he can completely negate any instance of it, especially one as hard to proc as it is.
Sweet. Thanks Meddler. :D
So Garen gets rid of GP's DoT along the slow when he Q's? Neat
Quinn, that is all.

> it also slows, and baron and drag are coded to be immune to CC, thus some where along the line it completely blocks out his passive because of the slow. 

This. 

>Which should be fixed.

Also this. Take my upvote.

> If i had to guess it would be because it also slows, and baron and drag are coded to be immune to CC, thus some where along the line it completely blocks out his passive because of the slow. Which should be fixed.

Saw the title, immediately thought this.  Other champs with CC tied to damaging abilities still do damage (I've stolen Dragon with MF and Leona ults, a friend stole Baron with a Janna Qnado), so this should definitely be addressed.
gotta pay for that lack of mobility

Riot hates GP. 

/thread

Dammit Riot!

Allow us to get Baron Drunk on Rum
Sounds like a bug. GP doesn't make #lc$bigplays so I guess, Riot didn't even think about GP and possible bugs on him with SR rework.
Talon made LCSbig plays. Talon was nerfed. How do you respond to that?

Oh shit.

You just rebelled against the lcs big plays circle jerk

Rip in peace my friend...
I am dying anyway (coughs weakly). Might as well do something positive before I go.
What a brave soul...

Talon only had situational mobility

he couldn't outplay to the level of {{champion:64}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:238}} etc.

So he was nerfed
And Kassadin?
where is the flashynesss in kassadin
R, E, Q, Stab. Repeat. There is no flashyness, just him having an equivalent of flash on a low cooldown.
A flash on a low cooldown isn't flashy?
Talon prevented Zed and Leblanc LC$Big Plays. Not allowable

Why was Kassadin nerfed? Why doesn't Riot buff Katarina for LCS play? Fiora makes "Big plays" - she even goes untargetable while dealing damage. Then there is Lucian - people said that he wasn't nerfed because of big plays? Why was he nerfed? 

Why is Lulu allowed in a solo lane when she can't make big plays? Same with Morgana, except she is also allowed to support.

Tell me why there are so many exceptions, please.

Kassadin's #LC$BIGPLAYS consisted of being banned every game, and then being really annoying, and then just popping squishes with button clicks. He also looked really ugly and didn't have to juggle 7 skills, 2 passives, and a pet/alternate form, so he got the nerf bat.

Riven, too.  Remember when she was commonly played in pro games?  More exciting to watch than Lee Sin, and yet, nerfed.  It's almost like Riot actually does balance for balance, and Lee/Zed are "ignored" because they aren't really as OP as people think they are.
All the times I jungled with GP, I never noticed this. Huh. I hope Riot gives this a look so the pirate get a little love in the form of a QoL fix.
Same reason karma can't shield turrets while most others can.
Uh...Janna can shield turrets. How is that 'most others'?

> [{quoted}](name=OhOkYea,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Wdn0gbjF,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-03-03T22:52:38.055+0000)
>
> Same reason karma can't shield turrets while most others can.

LOL Janna is the only champion in League that can shield a turret.
wrong
Name one other champion who can, and mind you, get some proof to back it up.
The best case they could make is Braum can shield turrets from ranged auto attacks with his wall, but that's about it.
The baron and dragon are definitely too big to have their BAC effected by the grog soaked shiv.

LOL I've been playing three games a day with gp on average in the last months and have never noticed that.

This issue had me wonder what if his passive will get to deal %health damage with the same stacking mechanism for enhanced jungling swagger when (and if T_T) he gets reworked.

It still makes me sad that shaco boxes do not apply such or any on hit effects, given Teemo shrooms do. Bought liandrees and morello a few times on ARAM as him due to his boxes being magic damage. Even if it would be OP, it could say on the skill that it doesn't apply any on hit effects. After all Teemos shrooms do.

MAGIC DAMAGE: 35 / 50 / 65 / 80 / 95 (+ 20% AP)
MAXIMUM MAGIC DAMAGE: 315 / 450 / 585 / 720 / 855 (+ 180% AP)
